question: وَلَآمُرَنَّهُمْ
answer: and surely I will order them

question: وَلَآمُرَنَّهُمْ
answer: and surely I will order them

question: فَلَيُبَتِّكُنَّ
answer: so they will surely cut off

question: وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ
answer: And (prohibited are) the ones who are married

question: لَسَلَّطَهُمْ
answer: surely He (would have) given them power

question: وَالْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ
answer: and the ones who are weak

question: وَلَأُضِلَّنَّهُمْ
answer: And I will surely mislead them

question: فَتِيلًا
answer: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed

question: فَتِيلًا
answer: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed

question: فَلَقَاتَلُوكُمْ
answer: and surely they (would have) fought you

question: الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
answer: the ones who are near (to Allah)

question: تُقْسِطُوا
answer: you will be able to do justice

question: وَلَأُمَنِّيَنَّهُمْ
answer: and surely arouse desires in them

question: نَقِيرًا
answer: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed

question: نَقِيرًا
answer: (even as much as) the speck on a date-seed

question: وَلَهَدَيْنَاهُمْ
answer: And We would have guided them

question: فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ
answer: then He will give them in full
